Backlog tool: Kiln (github.com/Kiln-AI/Kiln) - Desktop app no-code per fine-tuning, RAG, agents, synthetic data. Zero GPU required. Indie hacker friendly. Use cases: AI verticali, dataset marketplace, white-label AI per clienti. Attivare quando si lancia prodotto AI-based.
